sentences.sentence: Yarn hairiness and twist unevenness affect fabric quality seriously.
sentences.translation: 纱线毛羽与捻度不匀严重影响织物质量。

sentences.sentence: Leaf texture and hairiness and flower head size are the highly variable characters.
sentences.translation: 叶毛羽和花头大小、质地是参差不齐字。

sentences.sentence: One suggestion is that our ancestors shed hairiness to keep cool when venturing across the hot savannahs of Africa.
sentences.translation: 一种观点认为，当我们的祖先冒险穿越非洲炎热的萨凡纳地区时，为了保持周身的凉爽，他们选择自己脱去毛发。
